mil6.3.6:1.1_0: “Bhante nāgasena, ye te sattā maranti, sabbe te kāleyeva maranti, udāhu akālepi marantī”ti?
mil6.3.6:1.2_0: “Atthi, mahārāja, kālepi maraṇaṁ, atthi akālepi maraṇan”ti.
mil6.3.6:2.1_0: “Bhante nāgasena, ke kāle maranti, ke akāle marantī”ti?
mil6.3.6:2.2_2: aññasmā vā pana phalarukkhā phalāni patantāni āmāni ca pakkāni cā”ti?
mil6.3.6:2.4_1: sabbāni tāni kāleyeva patanti, udāhu akālepī”ti?
mil6.3.6:2.5_1: phalāni paripakkāni vilīnāni patanti, sabbāni tāni kāle patanti.
mil6.3.6:2.6_0: Yāni pana tāni avasesāni phalāni tesu kānici kimividdhāni patanti, kānici laguḷahatāni patanti,
mil6.3.6:2.7_0: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, ye te jarāvegahatā maranti, teyeva kāle maranti,
mil6.3.6:2.7_1: avasesā keci kammappaṭibāḷhā maranti, keci gatippaṭibāḷhā maranti,
mil6.3.6:3.1_4: yepi te jarāvegappaṭibāḷhā maranti, sabbe te kāleyeva maranti, yopi mātukucchigato marati, so tassa kālo, kāleyeva so marati.
mil6.3.6:3.2_0: Yopi vijātaghare marati, so tassa kālo, sopi kāleyeva marati.
mil6.3.6:3.4_0: yopi vassasatiko marati, so tassa kālo, kāleyeva so marati, tena hi, bhante nāgasena, akāle maraṇaṁ nāma na hoti, ye keci maranti, sabbe te kāleyeva marantī”ti.
mil6.3.6:4.3_1: bhojanaṁ alabhamāno upahatabbhantaro vijjamānepi uttariṁ āyusmiṁ akāle marati;
mil6.3.6:4.4_1: pānīyaṁ alabhamāno parisukkhahadayo vijjamānepi uttariṁ āyusmiṁ akāle marati;
mil6.3.6:4.5_1: visavegābhihato tikicchakaṁ alabhamāno vijjamānepi uttariṁ āyusmiṁ akāle marati;
mil6.3.6:4.6_1: ḍayhantesu aṅgapaccaṅgesu agadaṁ alabhamāno vijjamānepi uttariṁ āyusmiṁ akāle marati;
mil6.3.6:4.7_1: jhāyamāno nibbāpanaṁ alabhamāno vijjamānepi uttariṁ āyusmiṁ akāle marati;
mil6.3.6:4.8_1: patiṭṭhaṁ alabhamāno vijjamānepi uttariṁ āyusmiṁ akāle marati;
mil6.3.6:4.9_1: ābādhiko bhisakkaṁ alabhamāno vijjamānepi uttariṁ āyusmiṁ akāle marati;
mil6.3.6:4.10_1: satta vijjamānepi uttariṁ āyusmiṁ akāle maranti.
mil6.3.6:5.1_1: vātasamuṭṭhānena pittasamuṭṭhānena semhasamuṭṭhānena sannipātikena utuvipariṇāmena visamaparihārena opakkamikena kammavipākena, mahārāja, sattānaṁ kālaṅkiriyā hoti.
mil6.3.6:7.1_1: sattā pubbe katena tena tena akusalakammavipākena maranti.
mil6.3.6:7.2_2: so bahūni vassasatasahassāni jighacchāya paripīḷito chāto parikilanto sukkhamilātahadayo bubhukkhito visukkhito jhāyanto abbhantaraṁ pariḍayhanto jighacchāyayeva marati daharopi majjhimopi mahallakopi, idampi tassa sāmayikamaraṇaṁ.
mil6.3.6:8.1_1: so bahūni vassasatasahassāni peto hutvā nijjhāmataṇhiko samāno lūkho kiso parisukkhitahadayo pipāsāyayeva marati daharopi majjhimopi mahallakopi, idampi tassa sāmayikamaraṇaṁ.
mil6.3.6:9.1_0: Yo pubbe pare ahinā ḍaṁsāpetvā māreti,
mil6.3.6:9.1_1: so bahūni vassasatasahassāni ajagaramukheneva ajagaramukhaṁ kaṇhasappamukheneva kaṇhasappamukhaṁ parivattitvā tehi khāyitakhāyito ahīhi daṭṭhoyeva marati daharopi majjhimopi mahallakopi, idampi tassa sāmayikamaraṇaṁ.
mil6.3.6:10.1_0: Yo pubbe pare visaṁ datvā māreti,
mil6.3.6:10.1_1: so bahūni vassasatasahassāni ḍayhantehi aṅgapaccaṅgehi bhijjamānena sarīrena kuṇapagandhaṁ vāyanto viseneva marati daharopi majjhimopi mahallakopi, idampi tassa sāmayikamaraṇaṁ.
mil6.3.6:11.1_1: so bahūni vassasatasahassāni aṅgārapabbateneva aṅgārapabbataṁ yamavisayeneva yamavisayaṁ parivattitvā daḍḍhavidaḍḍhagatto aggināyeva marati daharopi majjhimopi mahallakopi, idampi tassa sāmayikamaraṇaṁ.
mil6.3.6:12.1_1: so bahūni vassasatasahassāni hataviluttabhaggadubbalagatto khubbhitacitto udakeneva marati daharopi majjhimopi mahallakopi, idampi tassa sāmayikamaraṇaṁ.
mil6.3.6:13.1_1: so bahūni vassasatasahassāni chinnabhinnakoṭṭitavikoṭṭito sattimukhasamāhato sattiyāyeva marati daharopi majjhimopi mahallakopi,
mil6.3.6:14.1_2: iṅgha me tvaṁ tattha kāraṇaṁ atidisāti”.
mil6.3.6:14.2_2: so aggi vuccati ‘anītiko anupaddavo samaye nibbuto nāmā’ti;
mil6.3.6:14.3_1: yo koci bahūni divasasahassāni jīvitvā jarājiṇṇo āyukkhayā anītiko anupaddavo marati,
mil6.3.6:15.1_2: taṁ apariyādinneyeva tiṇakaṭṭhasākhāpalāse mahatimahāmegho abhippavassitvā nibbāpeyya, api nu kho, mahārāja,
mil6.3.6:15.3_1: pacchimo aggikkhandho purimakena aggikkhandhena samasamagatiko nāhosī”ti?
mil6.3.6:15.4_1: meghena paṭipīḷito so aggikkhandho asamaye nibbuto”ti.
mil6.3.6:15.5_0: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, yo koci akāle marati,
mil6.3.6:15.5_1: so āgantukena rogena paṭipīḷito vātasamuṭṭhānena vā pittasamuṭṭhānena vā semhasamuṭṭhānena vā sannipātikena vā utupariṇāmajena vā visamaparihārajena vā opakkamikena vā jighacchāya vā pipāsāya vā sappadaṭṭhena vā visamāsitena vā agginā vā udakena vā sattivegappaṭipīḷito vā akāle marati.
mil6.3.6:16.1_1: gagane mahatimahāvalāhako uṭṭhahitvā ninnañca thalañca paripūrayanto abhivassati,
mil6.3.6:16.2_1: yo koci ciraṁ jīvitvā jarājiṇṇo āyukkhayā anītiko anupaddavo marati,
mil6.3.6:17.1_1: gagane mahatimahāvalāhako uṭṭhahitvā antarāyeva mahatā vātena abbhatthaṁ gaccheyya, api nu kho so, mahārāja,
mil6.3.6:17.3_1: pacchimo valāhako purimena valāhakena samasamagatiko nāhosī”ti?
mil6.3.6:17.4_1: vātena paṭipīḷito so valāhako asamayappattoyeva vigato”ti.
mil6.3.6:17.5_0: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, yo koci akāle marati,
mil6.3.6:17.5_1: so āgantukena rogena paṭipīḷito vātasamuṭṭhānena vā …pe…
mil6.3.6:18.1_1: balavā āsīviso kupito kiñcideva purisaṁ ḍaṁseyya,
mil6.3.6:18.1_2: tassa taṁ visaṁ anītikaṁ anupaddavaṁ maraṇaṁ pāpeyya,
mil6.3.6:18.2_1: yo koci ciraṁ jīvitvā jarājiṇṇo āyukkhayā anītiko anupaddavo marati,
mil6.3.6:18.2_2: so vuccati ‘anītiko anupaddavo jīvitakoṭigato sāmayikaṁ maraṇamupagato’ti.
mil6.3.6:19.1_1: balavatā āsīvisena daṭṭhassa antarāyeva āhituṇḍiko agadaṁ datvā avisaṁ kareyya, api nu kho taṁ, mahārāja,
mil6.3.6:19.3_1: pacchimaṁ visaṁ purimakena visena samasamagatikaṁ nāhosī”ti?
mil6.3.6:19.5_0: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, yo koci akāle marati,
mil6.3.6:19.5_1: so āgantukena rogena paṭipīḷito vātasamuṭṭhānena vā …pe…
mil6.3.6:20.1_0: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, issāso saraṁ pāteyya,
mil6.3.6:20.1_2: so saro vuccati ‘anītiko anupaddavo yathāgatigamanapathamatthakaṁ gato nāmā’ti;
mil6.3.6:20.2_1: yo koci ciraṁ jīvitvā jarājiṇṇo āyukkhayā anītiko anupaddavo marati,
mil6.3.6:21.1_0: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, issāso saraṁ pāteyya,
mil6.3.6:21.1_1: tassa taṁ saraṁ tasmiṁyeva khaṇe koci gaṇheyya, api nu kho so, mahārāja,
mil6.3.6:21.3_1: pacchimo saro purimakena sarena samasamagatiko nāhosī”ti?
mil6.3.6:21.5_0: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, yo koci akāle marati,
mil6.3.6:21.5_1: so āgantukena rogena paṭipīḷito vātasamuṭṭhānena vā …pe…
mil6.3.6:22.1_2: tassa ākoṭanena saddo nibbattitvā yathāgatigamanapathamatthakaṁ gacchati,
mil6.3.6:22.1_3: so saddo vuccati ‘anītiko anupaddavo yathāgatigamanapathamatthakaṁ gato nāmā’ti;
mil6.3.6:22.2_1: yo koci bahūni divasasahassāni jīvitvā jarājiṇṇo āyukkhayā anītiko anupaddavo marati,
mil6.3.6:23.1_4: saha āmasanena saddo nirujjheyya, api nu kho so, mahārāja,
mil6.3.6:23.3_1: pacchimo saddo purimakena saddena samasamagatiko nāhosī”ti?
mil6.3.6:23.5_0: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, yo koci akāle marati,
mil6.3.6:23.5_1: so āgantukena rogena paṭipīḷito vātasamuṭṭhānena vā …pe…
mil6.3.6:24.1_1: khette suvirūḷhaṁ dhaññabījaṁ sammā pavattamānena vassena otatavitataākiṇṇabahuphalaṁ hutvā sassuṭṭhānasamayaṁ pāpuṇāti,
mil6.3.6:24.1_2: taṁ dhaññaṁ vuccati ‘anītikamanupaddavaṁ samayasampattaṁ nāma hotī’ti;
mil6.3.6:24.2_1: yo koci bahūni divasasahassāni jīvitvā jarājiṇṇo āyukkhayā anītiko anupaddavo marati,
mil6.3.6:25.1_1: khette suvirūḷhaṁ dhaññabījaṁ udakena vikalaṁ mareyya, api nu kho taṁ, mahārāja,
mil6.3.6:25.3_1: pacchimaṁ dhaññaṁ purimakena dhaññena samasamagatikaṁ nāhosī”ti?
mil6.3.6:25.5_0: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, yo koci akāle marati,
mil6.3.6:25.5_1: so āgantukena rogena paṭipīḷito vātasamuṭṭhānena vā …pe…
mil6.3.6:26.3_0: “Kiṁ nu kho taṁ, mahārāja, sassaṁ kāle naṭṭhaṁ, udāhu akāle naṭṭhan”ti?
mil6.3.6:26.4_0: “Akāle, bhante, yadi kho taṁ, bhante, sassaṁ kimayo na khādeyyuṁ,
mil6.3.6:26.7_0: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, yo koci akāle marati,
mil6.3.6:26.7_1: so āgantukena rogena paṭipīḷito vātasamuṭṭhānena vā …pe…
mil6.3.6:27.1_1: ‘sampanne sasse phalabhāranamite mañjaritapatte karakavassaṁ nāma vassajāti nipatitvā vināseti aphalaṁ karotī’”ti?
mil6.3.6:27.3_0: “Api nu kho taṁ, mahārāja, sassaṁ kāle naṭṭhaṁ, udāhu akāle naṭṭhan”ti?
mil6.3.6:27.4_1: sassaṁ karakavassaṁ na vasseyya sassuddharaṇasamayaṁ pāpuṇeyyā”ti.
mil6.3.6:27.7_0: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, yo koci akāle marati,
mil6.3.6:27.7_1: so āgantukena rogena paṭipīḷito vātasamuṭṭhānena vā pittasamuṭṭhānena vā semhasamuṭṭhānena vā sannipātikena vā utupariṇāmajena vā visamaparihārajena vā opakkamikena vā jighacchāya vā pipāsāya vā sappadaṭṭhena vā visamāsitena vā agginā vā udakena vā sattivegappaṭipīḷito vā akāle marati.
mil6.3.6:27.8_0: Yadi pana āgantukena rogena paṭipīḷito na bhaveyya, samayeva maraṇaṁ pāpuṇeyya.
mil6.3.6:28.1_0: “Acchariyaṁ, bhante nāgasena, abbhutaṁ, bhante nāgasena, sudassitaṁ kāraṇaṁ,
mil6.3.6:28.1_2: ‘atthi akāle maraṇan’ti uttānīkataṁ pākaṭaṁ kataṁ vibhūtaṁ kataṁ, acittavikkhittakopi, bhante nāgasena,
mil6.3.6:28.1_3: manujo ekamekenapi tāva opammena niṭṭhaṁ gaccheyya ‘atthi akāle maraṇan’ti, kiṁ pana manujo sacetano?
mil6.3.6:28.2_2: api ca aparāparaṁ nibbāhanaṁ sotukāmo na sampaṭicchin”ti.
